outputs.name: interior_wall
outputs.description: A modifier object for the set's interior walls.

outputs.name: ceiling
outputs.description: A modifier object for the set's interior roofs.

outputs.name: interior_floor
outputs.description: A modifier object for the set's interior floors.

outputs.name: interior_window
outputs.description:
A modifier object for all apertures with a Surface
boundary condition.

outputs.name: interior_door
outputs.description:
A modifier object for all opaque doors with a Surface
boundary condition.

outputs.name: int_glass_door
outputs.description:
A modifier object for all glass doors with a Surface
boundary condition.

outputs.name: interior_shade
outputs.description: A modifier object for all interior shades.

inputs.name: _mod_set
inputs.description:
A modifier set to be deconstructed. This can also be
text for a modifier set to be looked up in the modifier
set library.

code:
try:  # import the honeybee-radiance dependencies
    from honeybee_radiance.modifierset import ModifierSet
    from honeybee_radiance.lib.modifiersets import modifier_set_by_identifier
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee_radiance:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import ladybug_{{cad}} dependencies
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    # check the input
    if isinstance(_mod_set, str):
        _mod_set = modifier_set_by_identifier(_mod_set)
    else:
        assert isinstance(_mod_set, ModifierSet), \
            'Expected ModifierSet. Got {}.'.format(type(_mod_set))

    interior_wall = _mod_set.wall_set.interior_modifier
    ceiling = _mod_set.roof_ceiling_set.interior_modifier
    interior_floor = _mod_set.floor_set.interior_modifier
    interior_window = _mod_set.aperture_set.interior_modifier
    interior_door = _mod_set.door_set.interior_modifier
    int_glass_door = _mod_set.door_set.interior_glass_modifier
    interior_shade = _mod_set.shade_set.interior_modifier
name: HB Deconstruct ModifierSet Interior
description:
Deconstruct a modifier set into its constituient interior modifiers.
-
